name: Zod superRefine 最小
description: 相関検証に superRefine を使う最小例

files.template:
import { z } from 'zod';
export const S = z.object({ start: z.date(), end: z.date() }).superRefine((v, ctx)=>{ if(v.end < v.start){ ctx.addIssue({ code: z.ZodIssueCode.custom, path:['end'], message:'must be after start' }); } });
